content:
The chunk is part of a section detailing how to enable direct tools in Panda3D for programming support. It demonstrates code to activate these tools, mentions the appearance of the Direct Session window, and notes alternative methods via utility functions, linking to further sub-sections like scene graph browser and enhanced mouse navigation.

from panda3d.core import loadPrcFileData
loadPrcFileData("", "want-directtools #t")
loadPrcFileData("", "want-tk #t")

After enabling direct tools and starting panda, the Direct Session window should appear:

Many of these tools can also be launched by calling specific utility functions <inspection-utilities>.

Table of Contents

scene-graph-browser enhanced-mouse-navigation utility-functions
